name: Hugging Face Transformers Agents
key_features: Extensible agent framework spun out into the standalone smolagents library
Allows language models to call tools for tasks like web search, code execution, and image generation
Supports iterative reasoning with memory to refine tool calls
Agents and tools can be shared via the Hugging Face Hub
Llama-3-70B-Instruct agent outperformed GPT-4 based agents on the GAIA benchmark
supported_models: Any model available through the Hugging Face Hub
pricing_model: Open-source; users pay for model inference or hosting
